sentences.sContent: The president said he could deputize the Florida National Guard to help with security.
sentences.sCn: 该总统说他可能委托佛罗里达国民警卫队为代表去帮助提供安全保障。

remMethod.val: 来自depute(v. 派…为代表或代理)

words.tran: 委任；授权给；指定…为代理人

trans.tranOther: to do the work of someone of a higher rank than you for a short time because they are unable to do it
